\textbf{\field{measurementTimestamp}} & string (date-time) & Measurementtimestamp field value \\
\textbf{\field{recordId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the record \\
\textbf{\field{traceableUnitId}} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to the traceable unit \\
\field{lastUpdated} & string (date-time) & Timestamp of the most recent data update \\
\field{measuredDiameter} & number (≥0) & Measureddiameter field value \\
\field{measuredLength} & number (≥0) & Measuredlength field value \\
\field{measuredVolume} & number (≥0) & Measuredvolume field value \\
\field{measurementGeographicDataId} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the measurementgeographicdata \\
\field{moistureAccuracy} & number (≥0) & Estimated accuracy of moisture measurement (± percentage points) \\
\field{moistureContent} & number (≥0, ≤100) & Moisture content as percentage of weight contributed by water (0-100\%) \\
\field{moistureMethod} & enum(8 values) & Method used to determine moisture content \\
\field{moistureStandard} & enum(5 values) & Standard procedure followed for moisture measurement \\
\field{operatorId} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to the operator who performed this action \\
\field{speciesMeasurements} & array<string> & Array of speciesmeasurements values \\
\field{trackingPointId} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the trackingpoint \\
